issue.title: [C++] CUDA on Windows fails to build
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17421](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17421). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
While working on the vcpkg port for 9.0.0 I noticed that Arrow with ARROW_CUDA does not build on Windows due to an issue with unique_ptr in CudaDevice.
